reviews.text: I'd like to thank all the excellent staff at fort William train station who helped me on 9th September 2019 with my two cairn terrier pups. Great service and day on the Jacobite.
Great travel centre here in Fort William. this is where you can catch the Jacobite Steam Train to travel to Mallaig, over the Glenfinnan viaduct.
The train journey from Fort William to Glasgow has to be one the world's greatest. Nothing less than spectacular

I have visited Fort William many times over the past 25 years and would highly recommend here to anyone looking to get away from a busy life style for a short break, long break or permanent break. Unfortunately i haven't traveled  on train yet. But imagine it wouldn't be a disappointment to  travel the train line especially on the steam trains
Good weekend gateway!!! View is beautiful across the mountains and lake!
